title: Kekkai Sensen
alternative_title: Blood Blockade Battlefront, Bloodline Battlefront, 血界戦線
description: A breach between Earth and the netherworlds has opened up over the city of New York, trapping New Yorkers and creatures from other dimensions in an impenetrable bubble. They've lived together for years, in a world of crazy crime sci-fi sensibilities. Now someone is threatening to sever the bubble, and a group of stylish superhumans is working to keep it from happening.
genre: [<Genre -> Action>, <Genre -> Adventure>, <Genre -> Fantasy>, <Genre -> Seinen>, <Genre -> Super Power>, <Genre -> Supernatural>, <Genre -> Vampire>]
